experience.title: Research Engineer 1
experience.description: • NOVA Microservices Ecosystem: Architected a scalable, sensor-agnostic distributed system for IoT device management using Cassandra and MongoDB.• Data Retrieval and Communication: Enhanced data integrity with Python scripts for Cassandra and implemented a fault-tolerant communication layer using Kafka, NATS, MQTT, and REST.• Health Safety Microservice: Developed a microservice with Azure file system integration, optimizing packet transfers and efficiency.• Angular-Based Dashboards: Created digital twins of manufacturing processes using Angular and WebSocket APIs for real-time IoT data monitoring.• Prediction and Optimization Models: Integrated models into dashboards via Flask REST APIs for dynamic data visualization and streamlined data ingestion.• Company Website with Next.js: Built a responsive company website using Next.js and ChakraUI, with an admin portal, real-time data updates, and a robust backend using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
experience.description_html: • NOVA Microservices Ecosystem: Architected a scalable, sensor-agnostic distributed system for IoT device management using Cassandra and MongoDB.• Data Retrieval and Communication: Enhanced data integrity with Python scripts for Cassandra and implemented a fault-tolerant communication layer using Kafka, NATS, MQTT, and REST.• Health Safety Microservice: Developed a microservice with Azure file system integration, optimizing packet transfers and efficiency.• Angular-Based Dashboards: Created digital twins of manufacturing processes using Angular and WebSocket APIs for real-time IoT data monitoring.• Prediction and Optimization Models: Integrated models into dashboards via Flask REST APIs for dynamic data visualization and streamlined data ingestion.• Company Website with Next.js: Built a responsive company website using Next.js and ChakraUI, with an admin portal, real-time data updates, and a robust backend using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: • Implemented React for custom components and Material UI to align with the app's dashboard design, enhancing its aesthetics • Leveraged Redux for highly efficient state management, facilitating seamless transfer of data between parallel components • Created data-driven visualizations, including charts and animations, using D3.js for improved dashboard’s user interaction • Employed Git commands for version control and Bitbucket for repositories, ensuring code synchronization among the team
experience.description_html: • Implemented React for custom components and Material UI to align with the app's dashboard design, enhancing its aesthetics • Leveraged Redux for highly efficient state management, facilitating seamless transfer of data between parallel components • Created data-driven visualizations, including charts and animations, using D3.js for improved dashboard’s user interaction • Employed Git commands for version control and Bitbucket for repositories, ensuring code synchronization among the team

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: • Created operator portal to facilitate proper information transfer between affiliates, business units, and developers using Reactjs• Used MaterialUI to create custom components rapidly, used hooks, and used Axios to fetch data from the internal Databases • Created interactive visualizations using charts.js concerning Gross merchandise value for each of the product categories
experience.description_html: • Created operator portal to facilitate proper information transfer between affiliates, business units, and developers using Reactjs• Used MaterialUI to create custom components rapidly, used hooks, and used Axios to fetch data from the internal Databases • Created interactive visualizations using charts.js concerning Gross merchandise value for each of the product categories <!---->
